extension.summary: Estuary MOD V2 skin by Guilouz, adapted for Matrix by PvD
extension.description: Estuary MOD V2 is a mod from Estuary by Guilouz for Kodi 18 and adapted for Kodi 19 (Matrix) by PvD from Kodinerds Community. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use.
extension.disclaimer: For better experience, be sure to install all addons required by the theme.
